attributes.additional_details:
It is disrespectful to the memory of all those that were murdered , all survivors and all their family and friends and disrespectful towards Jews in general that find it very hurtful. 

It spreads hate and the hate leads to real life antisemitism in the form of graffiti and verbal abuse and real life violence against Jews in the street.
attributes.background:
Holocaust denial is illegal in 16 countries across the world. 

Social media is rife with Holocaust denial. 

It needs to stop. 

It needs to be deemed a "hate crime".
